entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning then changing to 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
